name: Roguelike 1.1
description:
Control:

A/D - Left/Right.

Left Mouse Button - Attack (Bug animation + you need to press, not clamp).

Shift - Run.

Space - Jump.

Escape - Closes the game.

Apples - Add health.

Star - Increases you in size, adds damage and increases your total HP.

________________________________________________________________________________

Further updates are planned: 

1. Voice acting.

2. Adding different locations.

3. Bug fixes and game improvements.
